active.name: Imbricate
active.effects: Reroll the stats on this item, up to twice per round and up to thrice with the [[File:Apex Inventor augment.png|20px|link=]] [[Arena/Augments|Apex Inventor]] augment. Each time you do so, the stats become higher in value.

effects_structured.raw: Reroll the stats on this item, up to twice per round and up to thrice with the [[File:Apex Inventor augment.png|20px|link=]] [[Arena/Augments|Apex Inventor]] augment. Each time you do so, the stats become higher in value.
